name: Fall animals
description:
Fall animals is a massively multiplayer party knockout game. Race other online players and complete the challenges by avoiding the obstacles.
Play with your friend or other players online. Invite your friends to Fall Animals and play against them.

There are so many characters, dances, animations and 18 maps you can choose from.

Join our discord channel for news and announcements. https://discord.gg/4GwvWjYk9w
